verbose_text: Using data on methylation within the promoters of APC, KISS1, PTPN6, CASP8 and AR as well as methylation at the H19 / IGF2 ICR and at a consensus LINE-1 sequence, we used ANOVA to determine whether the variation in methylation was greater between samples taken from different sites than for those taken from different depths within the same site.
evidence: KISS1, PTPN6, CASP8 and AR as well as methylation at the H19
